remarks: Universal propery of the free module by existential uniquenes. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Mar-2015.)
statement:
frlmup4.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` T ) $.
frlmup4.f $e |- F = ( R freeLMod I ) $.
frlmup4.u $e |- U = ( R unitVec I ) $.
frlmup4.c $e |- C = ( Base ` T ) $.
frlmup4 $p |- ( ( T e. LMod /\ I e. X /\ A : I --> C ) -> E! m e. ( F LMHom T ) ( m o. U ) = A ) $.
$d A m $.
$d F m $.
$d T m $.
$d U m $.
